mapper.sql: id, userid, overduecount, createdate, createid, createname, remark
mapper.select:
select count(e.id) as total from blacklist a left join sysuser b on b.id=a.userid left join loan d on d.userid=b.id left join repaydetail e on e.loanid=d.id where 1=1
and a.userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into blacklist (id, userid, overduecount, createdate, createid, createname, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overduecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update blacklist
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
overduecount = #{overduecount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createid = #{createid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createname = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
